column4: Where I can get Empathy when I close it? I see it in process list but can not find where to call its contact list. Pidgin has an icon at system tray
I would kill it in t he process window reopen it and go to its preferences to see if it has an systray icon options...if not  I would switch to pidgin
:) You are not need to kill it, simple open it again. The contact list will bring up again
